sources.title: Murder in Harlem (1935) OSCAR MICHEAUX
sources.description:
BLACK HISTORY MONTH
Stars: Clarence Brooks, Dorothy Van Engle, Andrew Bishop
Directors: Oscar Micheaux , Clarence Williams

A black night watchman at a chemical factory finds the body of a murdered white woman. After he reports it, he finds himself accused of the murder.

sources.title: Murder in Harlem
sources.description: A black night watchman in a chemical factory finds the body of a young white woman in the basement. Blamed for the murder, the man is tried but the real killer is unmasked during the trial. Loosely based upon elements of the Leo Frank murder trial.

metadata.Plot: A black night watchman at a chemical factory finds the body of a murdered white woman. After he reports it, he finds himself accused of the murder.
metadata.Actors: Clarence Brooks, Dorothy Van Engle, Andrew Bishop
